roleset.name: (cause to) be atop
roleset.note: SURMOUNT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'surmount' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry contiguous_location-47.8.This is a marginal usage; much more common is the 'overcome' sensebelow (surmount.02). (from surmount.01-v)

example.name: all args
example.text: John surmounted his enormous ice cream sundae with fifteen maraschino cherries.

example.name: more typically ergative
example.text: Fifteen maraschino cherries surmounted John's enormous ice cream sundae.

example.name: the one example
example.text: Indeed, during a recent post-production audience discussion, the director explained that her fondest artistic wish was to find a way to play ``Somewhere Over the Rainbow'' so that [the song's ``original beauty]-1 comes through,'' [*-1]surmounting the cliche.
